B. Proceedings concerning the payment of financial entitlements on account of the applicant ’s war veteran status
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant lodged a civil claim requesting ORG to pay him the financial entitlements he was eligible to under domestic law on account of his status as a war veteran .
